education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Startup Intern
info: At Luci, I’ve worn multiple hats—from leading beta testing efforts and identifying UX/UI improvements, to recruiting users as a campus ambassador and collecting product feedback. I also helped enhance the front-end of the marketing site and waitlist page to improve usability and drive engagement ahead of the product launch.

experience.title: Web Developer
info: During my time at CAEN, I supported a range of web projects for the College of Engineering—building and maintaining sites for faculty and labs using WordPress, HTML, and CSS. One of the highlights was developing a tool that reduced transcription costs by 50% by identifying the most cost-effective service through automated comparisons. I also worked closely with stakeholders to troubleshoot issues and improve site functionality based on user needs.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills in Web Development & Design, and get better handson experience with current technologies.
